Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick passenger at Harlem (Forest Park Branch). Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick passenger at Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
